title: The Desert fox
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, Dennis Tupicoff and Stephen Hills
brief_description: July, 1942, war veterans recall the best fighting animal of the era, and a great mate - the desert fox (who looks remarkably like Rommel), captured in a visual array of claymation, stop frame and animation in this war mockumentary.
creator_credit_for_label: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, Dennis Tupicoff and Stephen Hills
